thread.title: Altidore Issued Red Card on Bench for 'Foul and Abusive Language'
thread.title_full: Altidore Issued Red Card on Bench for 'Foul and Abusive Language'

author: Katie Richcreek
title: Altidore Issued Red Card on Bench for 'Foul and Abusive Language'
text:
Altidore Issued Red Card on Bench for 'Foul and Abusive Language' Bleacher Report 11 hrs ago Katie Richcreek © Twitter Jozy Altidore 's mouth earned him a red card while he sat on the bench during Wednesday's match between Toronto FC and the New York Red Bulls .
AdChoices The striker was issued the red card in the 34th minute for "foul and abusive language," per Gothamist's Dan Dickinson:
Jozy’s red listed in the match center as “Foul and Abusive Language”. #TORvNY
— Dan Dickinson (@GothamistDan) October 14, 2015 The referee Altidore reportedly verbally abused was Daniel Radford—the same official whose notebook his USMNT teammate, Clint Dempsey , tore up in June:
Daniel Radford is the referee whom Clint Dempsey tore up his notebook. Yes, he's the 4th referee that just red carded Jozy on the bench.
— Chris Tobin (@C_Tobin) October 14, 2015 Altidore will miss the club's next game against Columbus Crew SC.
[Twitter]
